data.title: C Site Execute Shrouded Step + Paranoia
data.description: Use this Shrouded Step + Paranoia combo to aggressively take space on C Site while the rest of your team pushes in through the C Site Arches Chokepoint.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Teleport + Paranoia
data.description: use this aggressive early round A Main Teleport + Paranoia to increase your ability to support your team's efforts to contest space in A Main.
